At the upcoming [This week in machine learning and AI European online Meetup](https://twimlai.com/meetups/trust-in-predictions-of-ml-models/), I'll be presenting and leading a discussion about the [Anchors paper](https://homes.cs.washington.edu/~marcotcr/aaai18.pdf), the next generation of machine learning interpretability tools. Come and join the fun! :-)

- Date:	Tuesday 4th December 2018
- Time:	19:00 PM CET/CEST

Join: https://twimlai.com/meetups/trust-in-predictions-of-ml-models/
